verbs.description: investors [V: can] get big tax breaks if they invest in opportunity zones under new treasury rules the opportunity zones come with several tax advantages capital gains placed in a certified opportunity zone fund will not be taxed through the end of 2026 or when the investment is sold whichever comes first treasury department opz capital craig bernstein treasury tax cnbc american investment council hm treasury america steven mnuchin president drew maloney official puerto rico art institute of chicago gop aic president trump
